item.title: GitHub Rankings Spain
item.description:
GitHubRankingsSpain

What is this?

This repository contains a set of rankings: * One of them is generated for every Spanish province. * With all the rankings of a region ( autonomous community or the complete country), the ranking of this region is generated.

What kind of rankings?: It sorts GitHub users by the number of public contributions and groups them by the location in their profile.

How is this dataset generated?

This repository contains the results of GitHubSpanishRankingGenerator.

To generate the rankings, it is necessary to use GitHubCity, which is also available at Pypi.

Original idea

Original idea by @jj

item.title: GitHubCity
item.description:
Go to the source code of the project.

This is a small library which gets all GitHub users given a city. Original idea is Top-GitHub-Users-Data by @JJ, an adaptation of top-github-users from @paulmillr.

This is an amazing Python library to study the GitHub community in a location. You can get all the GitHub users from a given location and obtain some data. For instance, you can generate one ranking like this ranking with the users from Spain (and its provinces).
